title: New: Westerman – Confirmation
content:
Photo: Jamie Sinclair

Blue Flowers are absolutely killing it right now.

Home to Nilüfer Yanya, Puma Blue and Westermann, amongst others, the London label has exquisite taste in songwriters. The aforementioned Westerman has spent the past couple of years gradually making a home for himself amongst London’s finest new artists, and cements his place on latest track, Confirmation. A more ambitious composition than the songwriting found on his Call And Response EP, it’s no less intoxicating and lyrically dexterous. Check it out below.
